Column Comment.0: LAND RIGHT CONSENT: Consents grant permission to conduct operations basedon approval of what is done or proposed by another. Conditions, including actions tobe taken or fees to be paid, may or may not be applied against the consent.
Column Comment.1: CONSENT BA IDENTIFIER: a unique identifier added to allow people or companiesto be associated with the consent. These people or companies may be validatedagainst the business associates table or simple stored in an unvalidated columndepending what you need to do with the data.
Column Comment.2: ACTIVE INDICATOR: A Y/N flag indicating whether this row of data is currently eitheractive / valid (Y) or inactive / invalid (N).
Column Comment.3: BUSINESS ASSOCIATE: unique identifier for the business associate who is involvedwith the consent. This column and FK are optional, if desired this validated columnmay be used or an unvalidated column (FULL NAME) may be used instead.
Column Comment.4: DESCRIPTION: Narrative description about the role played by a business associatein the consent.
Column Comment.5: EFFECTIVE DATE: date on which the data in this row came into effect.
Column Comment.6: EXPIRY DATE: Date on which the data in this row of data was no longer in effect.
Column Comment.7: FULL NAME: unvalidated column to allow associations between persons andcompanies that are not in the BA table.
Column Comment.8: ROW_MANAGEMENT_GUID: This value may be used to provide a global uniqueidentifier for this row of data. Use of this column is not mandatory, but if used,optional PPDM NOT NULL and UNIQUE INDEX constraints provided in the datamodel DDL should be created.
Column Comment.9: REMARK: Narrative remarks about this row of data.
Column Comment.10: CONSENT BUSINESS ASSOCIATE ROLE: Describes the role played by a businessassociate in obtaining a consent, such as signing authority, chief negotiator etc.
Column Comment.11: SOURCE: The individual, company, state, or government agency designated as thesource of information for this row.
Column Comment.12: ROW CHANGED BY: Application login id of the user who last changed the row.
Column Comment.13: ROW CHANGED DATE: System date of the last time the row was changed.
Column Comment.14: ROW CREATED BY: System user who created this row of data.
Column Comment.15: ROW CREATED DATE: Date that the row was created on.
Column Comment.16: ROW_EFFECTIVE_DATE: A system assigned date that specified when a row of datais effective from a systems perspective. This may be the date that a row of data wasmade available to end users, for example.
Column Comment.17: ROW_EXPIRY_DATE: A system assigned date that specified when a row of data isno longer effective from a systems perspective. This may be the date that a row ofdata was no longer available to end users, for example.
Column Comment.18: PPDM ROW QUALITY: A set of values indicating the quality of data in this row,usually with reference to the method or procedures used to load the data, althoughother types of quality reference are permitted.
